hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to offer thirteen rak`at in the night prayer and on hearing the Adhan for the morning prayer, he used to offer two light rak`at

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ مَا يُقْرَأُ فِي رَكْعَتَيِ الْفَجْرِ
chapter.eng-name: To offer two Rak'at before the Fajr prayer
